name: Classic Solitaire: Freecell Plus
description:
A new iphone version of the classic Freecell game!
Freecell requires skill and strategy to win while offering hours of entertainment.
Freecell became popular as one of solitaire games included with Windows and now it's ready for you to enjoy on your mobile device with touch interface. Use the four free card spots to move all the cards to the Foundation stacks for a win.


You can play this app in your iPhone, iPod or iPad!
With smooth drag and drop, clear and neat retina display graphics, you won't be looking for any other Freecell app.

Features includes:
- Universal App;
- Easy drag and drop;
- Auto fill card to foundation piles;
- Portrait and landscape mode;
- Easy to read and brand new original card set;

- Gamecenter leaderboards:
-- Games played
-- Games won;
-- Cumulative time played;
-- Best times;
-- Best moves;
- Gamecenter Achievements with milestones as you progress into the game
